text: Daan Park is a metro station on the Tamsui-Xinyi Line in Taipei, Taiwan. The station code of this station is R06. == Station layout information == The platforms are located underground. Platform 1 is for Tamsui or Beitou and Platform 2 is for Xiangshan or Daan. == Around the station == * Daan Forest Park * Taipei Grand Mosque Category:Railway stations in Taipei
title: Daan Park metro station
